design_identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

theme_strategy.instructions: Implement a theme toggle (Sun/Moon). Default to Dark Mode for the 'Developer Tool' aesthetic. Ensure all components support both 'class' based dark mode.

typography.rules: Use Space Grotesk for Headings to give a 'Technical/Structural' feel. Use Inter for UI density. Use JetBrains Mono for all Table Names, Column Names, and SQL snippets.

accent.description: Electric Blue for active states, selection, and primary links. AVOID Teal.

layout_system.grid_mode: MODE B: High Density Grid (For Dashboards)

structure.sidebar: w-64 border-r border-border bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-xl h-screen fixed left-0 top-0 z-30
structure.main_canvas: flex-1 h-screen ml-64 bg-background relative overflow-hidden
structure.overlay_panel: absolute right-0 top-0 h-screen w-80 bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-md border-l border-border shadow-2xl transform transition-transform

layout_system.spacing: Use 'p-4' or 'p-6' for panels. Use 'gap-2' for dense lists.

customization_rules: Radius: 'rounded-md' (4px) or 'rounded-none' for a sharper, technical look.
Buttons: 'font-medium tracking-wide'. Primary buttons should be solid white (in dark mode) or black (in light mode).

key_components.name: GraphCanvas
key_components.description: The core visualization. Use React Flow for node-based dragging and connecting. Custom Nodes for Tables.

key_components.name: SqlImporter
key_components.description: Modal with syntax-highlighted textarea for pasting SQL.

key_components.name: ViewList
key_components.description: Filterable list of Views. Use Virtualization if many items.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md' on floating panels (Sidebar, Details Panel).
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'shadow-xl' for floating elements to lift them off the canvas.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Hover states on Graph Nodes (glow effect). Smooth transitions on Panel slide-in.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Consistent sizing (w-4 h-4 for UI, w-5 h-5 for Nav).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Initialize the React Flow environment immediately.
2. Create the SQL Parser utility to convert SQL CREATE VIEW statements into Node/Edge data structures.
3. Implement the Theme Toggle in the top-right corner.
4. Build the Sidebar with a 'Filter' input at the top.
5. Ensure the Graph supports: Dragging nodes, Zoom/Pan, Click to Select (shows details).
7. Mock the backend API calls initially if needed, but structure them for FastAPI integration.

universal_guidelines.design_philosophy: Avoid generic 'AI Slop'. Create depth through z-index and glassmorphism. Use micro-animations.
css_rules: Do NOT center align the app container globally.
Use modern button styles (sharp or pill).
universal_guidelines.export_convention: Named exports for Components, Default exports for Pages.

image_urls.logo: Use a text-based logo or a simple geometric icon from Lucide (e.g., Database, Network).
